rows.label: xs08060130_MSG0002
rows.name: Your army has unlawfully crossed New LA's defense perimeter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08060130_MSG0003
rows.name:
You have 10 seconds to halt your advance
and agree to negotiate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08060130_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you do not comply,[ST:page p1=40 ]we will have no choice but to interpret your actions
as a declaration of war and launch our counterattack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08060130_MSG0005
rows.name: Ten, nine, eight, seven, six, five, four,[ST:wait ]
